title.value: Формирование профессиональных компетенций по применению энергосберегающих технологий у студентов сельскохозяйственных ВУЗов
Formation of professional competence regarding the use of energy-efficient technologies among students of agricultural universities
Formation of professional competence regarding the use of energy-efficient technologies among students of agricultural universities

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Selitskaya, O.Yu., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: The article considers the problem of formation of professional competence on realization of energy saving technologies at students of agricultural higher education institutions that includes not only existence of professional knowledge, skills, but social and significant qualities of the person. It is shown that introduction in programs repair and technological practices and externship of students of the sections connected with the analysis and possibilities of use of energy saving technologies at the agrarian and industrial complex's enterprises will give the chance to be professionally competent in this area already in the course of real professional activity after the higher education institutions termination.
